citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 am on
05-Feb-18.
The inspector spoke to the facility representative by phone. He reported that he was not in town and would not be
available for an inspection.

narrative:
